goals.active: Go deeper into the vision of the past.
goals.complete: As I went deeper into the vision, I saw Bangar's movements firsthand through the eyes of Ryland Steelcatcher. Bangar and Ryland attempted to find a shortcut through the Darkrime Delves, but encountered resistance—and Almorra Soulkeeper—along the way.

goals.active: Continue the adventure through Darkrime Delves.
goals.complete: Through the eyes of Ryland, I witnessed the talks break down between Almorra and Bangar as they searched for the exit. Now, the two stand toe-to-toe as Almorra intends on stopping Bangar from trying to become Jormag's Champion. Ryland reluctantly steps in and must make a choice.
It was Bangar who had killed General Soulkeeper in a moment's fury. Seeing his plans and ambitions firsthand has reinforced my resolve. Ruinbringer must be stopped.
